description: This file defines two classes, Holding and PortfolioSummary, used to model financial portfolio data such as individual holdings and overall portfolio summaries, including calculations for investment metrics and dividend income.

classes.name: Holding
classes.description: Represents a single stock or asset holding with properties for symbol, quantity, average cost, and annual dividend per share. Includes methods to calculate invested amount, market value, and annual income.

classes.name: PortfolioSummary
classes.description: Encapsulates aggregate portfolio metrics such as total invested, market value, profit/loss, PnL percentage, and passive income. Provides a factory constructor to generate a summary from a list of holdings and current prices.

methods.name: PortfolioSummary.fromHoldings
methods.description: Creates a PortfolioSummary object by aggregating a list of holdings and current price map, calculating total invested, market value, profit/loss, PnL percentage, and annual dividend income.

methods.name: Holding.invested
methods.description: Returns the total amount invested in the holding (quantity * avgCost).

methods.name: Holding.marketValue
methods.description: Calculates current market value of the holding given a current price.

methods.name: Holding.annualIncome
methods.description: Calculates annual income from dividends based on quantity and annual dividend per share.
